channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 'It's still in our portfolio. We're not end of life the product': Samsung exec on why the Galaxy S25 Edge is so important and here to stay
item.description: The Galaxy S26 Edge was a no-show at Galaxy Unpacked, but there are a few very good reasons, and reasons for hope about an edgy future.

item.title: Ambient Dreamie bedside companion review: The best sleep I've had in years
item.description: How much would you pay for a good night's sleep? This is a question I've asked myself repeatedly over the last few weeks as I've been testing the Dreamie, a $250 alarm clock and "bedside companion" that I couldn't stop thinking about after I first encountered it at CES. Ambient's Dreamie offers many of the conveniences of a smartphone-connected device — highly customizable alarm schedules, a library of soundscapes and noise masks, Bluetooth so you can connect earbuds and podcasts (soon). But it is phone-free every step of the way, with all controls and features built-in so you don't end up get...

item.title: Security experts flag multiple issues in Claude Code, warning, 'As AI integration deepens, security controls must evolve to match the new trust boundaries'
item.description: An AI assistant can quickly turn into a malicious insider, so be careful with permissions.

item.title: Suicide et automutilation | Instagram va avertir les parents si un jeune effectue des recherches à répétition
item.description: Instagram va prévenir les parents ayant activé la supervision du compte de leur adolescent s’il effectue des recherches à répétition sur le suicide ou l’automutilation, a annoncé jeudi le réseau social dans un communiqué.

item.title: Amazfit's affordable, 5-star Apple Watch rival just got a surprise sequel — and it promises 'meaningful progress' for runners
item.description: The Amazfit Active 3 Premium is here, and it looks as though you get a lot for your money once again.

item.title: Comment les panneaux solaires améliorent la laine des moutons
item.description: Certains éleveurs ovins observent une amélioration de la qualité de la laine et une hausse de leurs recettes. Leur secret ? Des panneaux solaires installés sur leurs pâturages, qui modifient les conditions d’élevage.

item.title: The First Look at ‘Star City’ Is Here, and Apple TV’s Spin-Off Era Has Officially Begun
item.description: Set in the world of 'For All Mankind,' the new space race thriller is told from the Soviet Union's point of view.

item.title: Threads is testing a shortcut to quickly start DM conversations
item.description: Users who are part of the test can type "DM me" or "Message me" in a post or reply to automatically generate a hyperlink that invites others to start a private conversation with them.

item.title: Everything announced at Samsung Unpacked: The Galaxy S26 Ultra, Galaxy Buds 4 and more
item.description: Mobile World Congress is right around the corner, but Samsung got out ahead of many rivals that will be showing off new handsets at that event by running the latest edition of Unpacked on Wednesday. At its event in San Francisco’s Palace of Fine Arts, the company revealed the Galaxy S26 lineup, which includes the base S26, the S26+ and the S26 Ultra. We've got some hands-on time with all three handsets as well, and you can read about our in-person experience with the Galaxy S26 Ultra, as well as our S26 and S26+ impressions in those articles.In addition to those, Samsung announced the Galaxy B...

item.title: Zyxel warns over a dozen routers could be affected by critical RCE security flaw
item.description: Zyxel fixes a handful of worrying router flaws, including a critical RCE issue.

item.title: Firefox adds AI kill switch for users who are sick and tired of AI-everything
item.description: Firefox is rolling out an AI killswitch with its latest update.

item.title: Cet avantage de la Mustang électrique sur la thermique devient soudainement payant aux États-Unis : bye-bye le frunk
item.description: La Mustang Mach-E millésime 2026 intègre une nouveauté qui fait tiquer : son fameux frunk (coffre avant), jadis inclus de série, passe désormais dans la colonne des options. Heureusement, en France, ce n'est pas encore le cas.

item.title: Two years on, the Ninja Luxe Café is still one of my all-time favourite coffee machines for 'quality espresso' made easy
item.description: Ninja's three-in-one machine is one of the most versatile coffee makers I've ever used, and this is your chance to get one at a great price.

item.title: Where does your money go when you buy a VPN?
item.description: Security? Speed? Style? What are you really paying for when you pick up a VPN subscription?

item.title: Burger King will use AI to monitor employee 'friendliness'
item.description: Burger King, the chain that leans into creepy when others don't dare, is at it again. The Verge reported on Thursday that the company is rolling out a new voice-controlled AI chatbot for its workers. That may sound like business as usual in 2026, but this assistant doesn't just help with meal prep and monitor inventory. It also has an unsettling habit of surveilling employees' voices for "friendliness."The voice-controlled chatbot will live inside employees' headsets. The company said the AI is trained to recognize when its low-paid workers utter phrases like "welcome to Burger King," "please"...

item.title: Google Rolls Out Nano Banana 2, Now Faster Than Ever
item.description: Better model, same bad name.

item.title: Google lance déjà Nano Banana 2 et reste maitre de la génération d’image
item.description: Google continue de prendre de vitesse ses concurrents sur l'IA. La firme lance Nano Banana 2, son nouveau modèle de génération d'images développé sous le nom Gemini 3.1 Flash Image.

item.title: Razer’s new laptop sleeve wirelessly charges other devices
item.description: Razer has announced an expensive new laptop sleeve that's not made from an exotic animal or encrusted in diamonds. What potentially justifies paying $129.99 for Razer's Laptop Sleeve 16" are the pair of wireless charging pads integrated into its cover flap. While you're out and about, it can protect a laptop up to 16 inches […]

item.title: Proton, Tor, AdGuard among 40+ asking Google to reverse new 'alien security model' for Android developers
item.description: A group of privacy advocates and open-source leaders has signed an open letter urging Google to reverse its plans for mandatory developer verification, arguing the changes pose a physical threat to activists and developers.

item.title: Surveillance With a Smile: Burger King Will Use AI to Track If Employees Say ‘Please’ and ‘Thank You’
item.description: Service workers, meet the future.

item.title: Cartes graphiques : un véritable DRAM, la pénurie de GPU est imminente
item.description: Si vous comptiez rafraîchir votre setup PC prochainement, j'ai une mauvaise nouvelle. Nvidia vient de confirmer que les stocks de cartes GeForce vont fondre comme neige au soleil dans les prochains mois.

item.title: The RAM lottery crowns a new winner — Redditor buys a $300 Corsair Vengeance DDR5 kit and gets sent a box of 10 worth $3,000
item.description: 10 for the price of 1: Redditor buys 32GB DDR5 RAM kit for $300, ends up with 320GB of memory.

item.title: Get a free $20 gift card when you pre-order the Samsung Galaxy Buds 4 at Amazon
item.description: Samsung Galaxy Buds 4 (2026) are available to pre-order. If you pre-order at Amazon, you'll get a free $20 gift card.

item.title: La Liga's war on piracy is breaking the internet in Spain — and your VPN could be the next target
item.description: La Liga's aggressive anti-piracy blocking has led to a series of overblocking incidents when football matches are aired. Spaniards have been turning to VPNs to navigate recurring outages, but questions remain about the approach remain.

item.title: The free PlayStation Plus games for March have been revealed and they include Monster Hunter Rise and a seriously cute game that you 'could play for hours and hours'
item.description: Sony has officially announced the next batch of PlayStation Plus games for March 2026, which includes Monster Hunter Rise, PGA Tour 2K25, The Elder Scrolls Online Collection: Gold Road, and Slime Rancher 2.

item.title: Amazfit Active 3 Premium : une montre de running accessible, mais au design très soigné
item.description: Amazfit a dévoilé ce jeudi sa nouvelle montre d'entrée de gamme, l'Amazfit Active 3 Premium, pensée avant tout pour la course à pied.

item.title: New Apple products are expected next week — here are 12 deals on older models I’d buy right now
item.description: Apple's March event takes place next week with new products, which means it's a great time to find deals on existing models — here are today's 12 best deals.

item.title: Humans Sketched Oddly Precise Geometric Patterns Onto Ostrich Eggs 60,000 Years Ago
item.description: Prehistoric humans had a surprisingly sophisticated understanding of geometric rules, as this study suggests.

item.title: 'If your printer works today, it will continue to work' - Microsoft says it isn't killing off your old printer for good after all
item.description: Although Microsoft commits to not bricking printers using legacy drivers, it still wants you to upgrade to the IPP Class Driver.

item.title: Netflix en mars 2026 : ce catalogue m’a fait reprendre un abonnement ! Voici les séries, films et documentaires à ne pas manquer
item.description: Un catalogue 5 étoiles comme on en voit que très peu ! Voici les programmes à ne pas manquer en mars sur Netflix, et il y a de quoi occuper nombre de soirées et de pauses déjeuner avec ce qui nous attend.

item.title: 'Final Fantasy 14's The Primals will be at Download Festival 2026' sounds like something I just made up — but I promise you it's true
item.description: Final Fantasy 14's in-house band, The Primals, are heading to the UK for Download Festival 2026 — and I promise I've not just made that up.

item.title: Il voulait piloter son aspirateur avec sa PS5 et pirate 7 000 robots DJI par erreur
item.description: L'ingénieur Sammy Azdoufal voulait simplement piloter son nouvel aspirateur robot avec une manette de jeu. Il a fini par découvrir une faille de sécurité mondiale exposant l'intimité de milliers de foyers.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 phone cases: Where to get fun ones right now
item.description: At Samsung Unpacked, the brand released the new Samsung Galaxy S26 phone. If you've already preordered your new phones, start shopping for a new case from Samsung, Burga, and more.

item.title: The ‘Project Hail Mary’ Team Explains How That Lego Came to Be
item.description: io9 spoke to directors Phil Lord and Chris Miller and star Ryan Gosling about the cool Lego set.

item.title: Cricut’s most popular cutting machine now takes up less space in your crafting room
item.description: Cricut has announced new versions of two of its cutting machines that could appeal to crafters struggling with limited space for their hobby. The new Cricut Explore 5 is 30 percent "more compact" than the Explore 4 that launched a year ago, without reducing the size or types of materials the machine can handle. The […]

item.title: Read AI launches an email-based ‘digital twin’ to help you with schedules and answers
item.description: Read AI is launching Ada, which can reply with your availability and extract answers from the company knowledge base and the web.

item.title: ‘Our mind isn’t a dataset’ — as if Black Mirror taught us nothing at all, 33% of millennials and 25% of Gen Zers want to preserve themselves using AI
item.description: New research reveals a growing appetite for "AI immortality” among younger generations – even as experts warn the technology can’t truly recreate a human mind.
